      â–€  What's included in this version:
         
         * Win32 support

         * New Episode: The Fall

         To unlock the new content, you need to complete the main game. 
         
         Ben and Ed is a 3D platformer, in which the player controls Ed
         the Zombie, who is forced to participate in a grotesque game
         show called "Rundead". Will he beat all obstacles Hans
         Showmaster confronts him with, to save his best friend Ben?
